sentences: Chisom Obinna Onyeke (born 27 October 1988), known professionally as JaySynths, is a Nigerian record producer and sound engineer best known for producing Teni's hit single "Case" in 2018.
JaySynths was born and raised in Onitsha, Anambra State, Nigeria.
He began his education at All Saints Primary School, Onitsha, before preceding to Government Secondary School, Karshi, Abuja.
He has worked with Ice Prince, Victor AD, Mr Eazi, Broda Shaggi and Sarkodie.
JaySynths is married to an ex-beauty queen, Christy Daniels whom he met during his undergraduate days in the university and they have one child together.
